00048 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00049 /* Endpoint 0 ~ 7 Configuration                                                                             */
00050 /* !!! DO NOT MODIFY !!!                                                                                    */
00051 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00052 
00053 #define EP_TYPE_ISO         (1)
00054 #define EP_TYPE_BULK        (2)
00055 #define EP_TYPE_INT         (3)
00056 
00057 #ifndef _UIER_ALL
00058   #define _UIER_ALL _UIER
00059 #endif
00060 
00061 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00062 /* Endpoint0 Configuration                                                                                  */
00063 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00064 #define _EP0_CFG_EPEN       (1UL)
00065 #define _EP0STADR           (HT_USB_SRAM_BASE + 0x8)
00066 #define _EP0INTADR          (_EP0STADR)
00067 #define _EP0OUTTADR         (_EP0STADR + _EP0LEN)
00068 #define _EP0_CFG            ((_EP0_CFG_EPEN << 31) | \
00069                              (_EP0LEN       << 10) | \
00070                              (_EP0STADR & EPBUFA_MASK))
00071 #define _EP0LEN_T           (_EP0LEN * 2)
00072 
00073 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00074 /* Endpoint1 Configuration                                                                                  */
00075 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00076 #define _EP1STADR           (_EP0STADR + (_EP0LEN * 2))
00077 
00078 #if (_EP1_ENABLE == 1)
00079   #define _EP1LEN           (_EP1LEN_TMP)
00080 #else
00081   #define _EP1LEN           (0)
00082 #endif
00083 
00084 #if (_EP1_CFG_EPEN_TMP == 1)
00085   #define _EP1_CFG_EPEN     (1UL)
00086 #else
00087   #define _EP1_CFG_EPEN     (0UL)
00088 #endif
00089 
00090 #define _EP1_CFG            ((_EP1_CFG_EPEN  << 31) | \
00091                              (_EP1_CFG_EPDIR << 28) | \
00092                              (_EP1_CFG_EPADR << 24) | \
00093                              (_EP1LEN        << 10) | \
00094                              (_EP1STADR & EPBUFA_MASK))
00095 
00096 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00097 /* Endpoint2 Configuration                                                                                  */

00150 #else

00153 #endif
00154 #if (_EP4_TYPR == EP_TYPE_ISO)

00170                              (_EP4_CFG_SDBS   << 23) | \
